param.name: no_of_branches_allowed
param.label: No Of Branches Allowed
param.description: No Of Branches including HO

param.name: ACCOUNT_TYPES
param.label: ACCOUNT_TYPES Allowed
param.description: ACCOUNT_TYPES like Loan,CC,FixedAndMis,Default,SavingAndCurrent,Recurring,DDS

param.name: bank_has_rds
param.label: Bank Has RD(s)
param.description: Weather this Bank has Standard Type of RD Schemes

param.name: bank_has_fds
param.label: Bank Has FD(s)
param.description: Weather this Bank has Standard Type of FD Schemes

param.name: bank_has_saving_and_current_accounts
param.label: Bank Has Savings / Current A/Cs
param.description: Weather this Bank has Saving or Current Account Schemes

param.name: bank_has_loans
param.label: Bank Has Loans(s)
param.description: Weather this Bank has Standard Type of Loans Schemes

param.name: bank_has_cc
param.label: Bank Has CC(s)
param.description: Weather this Bank has Standard Type of CC Schemes

param.name: bank_has_dds
param.label: Bank Has DDS(s)
param.description: Weather this Bank has Standard Type of DDS (Daily Deposit Schemes) Schemes

param.name: bank_can_design_custom_schemes
param.label: Bank can design custom schemes
param.description: There is a Special Custom Scheme Designer other then above ones, Do this bank has access to that

param.name: allow_advanced_schemedesigner_options
param.label: Bank Has RD(s)
param.description: Weather this Bank has Standard Type of RD Schemes

param.name: member_has_code
param.label: Member has Member Code
param.description: Whether member has special code other than member id

param.name: member_code_auto_generated
param.label: Member Code Auto Generated
param.description: Whether member code is auto generated or not

param.name: default_member_code
param.label: Member Code Series Starts From
param.description: Give the starting Code of the series like J00000000

param.name: customer_has_code
param.label: Customer has Customer Code
param.description: Whether Customer has special code other than member id

param.name: customer_code_auto_generated
param.label: Customer Code Auto Generated
param.description: Whether Customer code is auto generated or not

param.name: default_customer_code
param.label: Customer Code Series Starts From
param.description: Give the starting Code of the series like C00000000

param.name: agent_has_code
param.label: Agent has Agent Code
param.description: Whether Agent has special code other than member code

param.name: agent_code_auto_generated
param.label: Agent Code Auto Generated
param.description: Whether Agent code is auto generated or not

param.name: default_agent_code
param.label: Agent Code Series Starts From
param.description: Give the starting Code of the series like 10001

param.name: share_accountnumber_auto_generated
param.label: Share Account Number Auto Generated
param.description: Whether Share Account Number is auto generated or not

param.name: default_share_accountnumber
param.label: Share Account Number Series Starts From
param.description: Give the starting Code of the series like SM0000000

param.name: saving_accountnumber_auto_generated
param.label: Saving Account Number Auto Generated
param.description: Whether Saving Account Number is auto generated or not

param.name: default_saving_accountnumber
param.label: Saving Account Number Series Starts From
param.description: Give the starting Code of the series like SB0000000

param.name: cc_accountnumber_auto_generated
param.label: CC Account Number Auto Generated
param.description: Whether CC Account Number is auto generated or not

param.name: default_cc_accountnumber
param.label: CC Account Number Series Starts From
param.description: Give the starting Code of the series like CC400

param.name: loan_accountnumber_auto_generated
param.label: Loan Account Number Auto Generated
param.description: Whether Loan Account Number is auto generated or not

param.name: default_loan_accountnumber
param.label: Loan Account Number Series Starts From
param.description: Give the starting Code of the series like L300

param.name: other_accountnumber_auto_generated
param.label: Other Account Numbers Auto Generated
param.description: Whether Other Account Numbers are auto generated or not

param.name: default_other_accountnumber
param.label: Other Account Numbers Series Starts From
param.description: Give the starting Code of the series like 14100000

param.name: RowsInData
param.label: Pagination Rows in Any Table View
param.description: How many lines of data in a table you want in any distributor_area views
